data.text:
#Mondaymotivation Poetry and music add to the deeper understanding of Kriolu. It is one of the few times no one really worries about which variation, and just feel the feels, but it is difficult to translate the full emotions. I tried to capture the sentiments in English that Paulo Ver√≠ssimo depicts in his poem, N Skesi di Fla-u. Kriolu Basics begins September 2024. Learn how to read, write, speak and even feel in Kriolu. üòâ

#freeyourmindfriday If language is part of identity, why was Kriolu literally beaten out of Capeverdeans? We maintain if it wasn't powerful, drastic measures would not have been taken in attempts to erase, minimize, or disqualify it. Full Video on Mili Mila Page on Instagram. Learn Kriolu with us. Kriolu Basics starts in September 2024. Visit us at www.mili-mila.com Download the Speak Kriolu App Today!! #SpeakKriolu #JoinTheConversation #UnlockCaboVerde #BePartOfHistory #liberatekriolu

#thoughtfulthursday "It's easy to break down and destroy. The heroes are those that make peace and build." - #NelsonMandela Every year on 18 July ‚Äî the day Nelson Mandela was born (1918) ‚Äî the United Nations joins a call by the Nelson Mandela Foundation to devote 67 minutes of time to helping others, as a way to mark Nelson Mandela International Day. Mr. Mandela spent 67 years making the world a better place. The celebration of Mandela Day aims to serve as a global call to action for people to "recognize their individual power to make an imprint and help change the world around them for the better", says the Nelson Mandela Foundation. Team Mili Mila challenges us all today to give a helping hand whether you assist the elderly, feed the homeless or simply give love to our neighbors. Honor Mandela and what he stood for, as our world needs it more now than ever! #djuntamon #jointhemovement #bepartofhistory #whynotus #getyours www.mili-mila.com #lovetrumpshate #freedom #worldcommunity

#wordwednesday. We are "Super" (read that in Kriolu...lol) excited to sit alongside some greats working for our community. Today at 6pm at Project HOPE (550 Dudley Street in Roxbury), join author of the Capeverdean Dictionary and Speak Kriolu App, Manuel Da Luz Gon√ßalves, founder of Kriolu Basics, Djofa Tavares, founder and creator of Kriolish, Edmar Gon√ßalves and award winning educator, Dr. Aminah Pilgrim for a panel discussion on the Cabo Verdean Kriolu Language and the story of Cabo Verdeans Coming to Massachusetts. Hosted by Roxbury Historical Society, Senator Liz Miranda and Mili Mila Inc. We would love to see you all. Nhos ven atxanu. DM for Zoom Link if you can't make it. Visit us at www.mili-mila.com Download the Speak Kriolu App Today!! #SpeakKriolu #JoinTheConversation #UnlockCaboVerde #BePartOfHistory

#Mondaymotivation We can see the light at the end of the tunnel...glory to God!! It has been an honor to work on the next edition of the Capeverdean Dictionary by Manuel Da Luz Gon√ßalves, although at times overwhelming and tedious, and obviously laborius (over 8 years)...see what I did there? Words, words, and more words...building my vocabulary in both English and Kriolu. Anywho, can't wait to share! Visit us at www.mili-mila.com Download the Speak Kriolu App Today!! #SpeakKriolu #JoinTheConversation #UnlockCaboVerde #BePartOfHistory

Join us on Wednesday, July 17th from 6pm to 7:30pm at Project Hope in Roxbury, for a panel discussion presented by the Roxbury Historical Society, Senator Liz Miranda and Mili Mila Inc. on the Cabo Verdean Kriolu Language and Cabo Verdeans Coming to Massachusetts. Panelists include Team Mili Mila members, author Manuel Da Luz Goncalves and editor Djofa Tavares, alongside author and community advocate, Dr. Aminah Pilgrim and founder of Kriolish, Edmar Gon√ßalves. Visit us at www.mili-mila.com Download the Speak Kriolu App Today!! #SpeakKriolu #JoinTheConversation #UnlockCaboVerde #BePartOfHistory

Some more captures at The Annual Rhode Island Capeverdean Independence Day Festival. Capeverdeans come in so many beautiful forms. Portraits of Cabo Verde Pride. "Passion for a country miles away, many of which haven't even seen, but the pride runs through our being, bringing us together in celebration." ‚úçÔ∏èüèΩüì∏Djofa See you next year for the 50th!! Visit us at www.mili-mila.com Download the Speak Kriolu App Today!! #SpeakKriolu #JoinTheConversation #UnlockCaboVerde #BePartOfHistory #cvindependenceday #AmilcarCabral #lutakontinua #cvtings #language
